enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-requisite: Students must have taken, be currently enrolled, or concurrently registered for RTVF 190 for the upcoming quarter.
title: SoC RTVF 369-0-21 Topics in Acting for the Screen

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Learning objectives: This class will examine the process of performance and narrative-creation via the increasingly utilized mode of improvisation. Utilizing long-form class exercises, students will work towards creating devised short film projects, both scripted (finally)and improvised.

subject: RTVF
